user_query: My company is organizing a team-building event. We need an outdoor location near Maribor. Can you recommend some adventure sports activities for the event? Also, provide me with a list of nearby restaurants that can accommodate a large group. Finally, suggest some local transportation options for our employees.

TaskList.description: Search for outdoor adventure sports activities available near Maribor.
Find nearby restaurants that can accommodate a large group near Maribor.
Suggest local transportation options for employees to reach the event location.
